website_summaries.verdict: Durable rubber edges and attractive price point make this perfect for teenagers, college students, and those who are hard on their technology.
pros: 11.6-inch diagonal HD SVA Antiglare WLED-backlit Display
Battery life is 12 hours and 30 minutes
cons: Does not come with a hard drive
Cannot play CDs or DVDs, or load new software through this drive
Problems with screen and battery life

customer_reviews.title: Literally the most useless thing I own now.
customer_reviews.text: I got a chromebook for school because it was cheap. Please do not make the same mistake I made. You can't download anything onto this thing. You can only use chrome apps from the webstore. All of those are browser based so you can't use them offline and you don't get the full function of it since its not the full downloaded application. There's not even a caps lock button on this thing. It's ok for writing papers, but you want to do anything else on it? Too bad. Spend an extra $50 and get a windows computer, please.
customer_reviews.author: denajen21

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does Not Stream Amazon Videos! It was one of the reasons I bought it. Update: A few days after I wrote this it prompted an OS update, and now Amazon videos stream perfectly. I had tried at the time of the problem to update the OS to no avail, but it eventually did. This computer is a delight. I'm particularly thankful for the cloud-based, open source apps (docs, sheets, slides, ...) that obviate MicroSoft, and of course that the Chrome OS is a nimble alternative to the albatross that is Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Putt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Print
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this laptop the only thing that stinks is that it doesn’t print!!!!! So what is the point of having this laptop for a college student?
customer_reviews.author: Liz Perez

customer_reviews.title: this is a great little computer
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for light useage i.e video streaming and word processing, this is a great little computer. It's not for gaming or anything, but if you have a blog, or if you just like to stream videos while you do homework, this really gets the job done. The battery life is surprisingly long, but I also don't use it for very long periods of time. That being said, when I do use it, the battery lasts. I'd recommend this to a casual blogger or a super poor college student just trying to get by. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Em Penny

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice for a Light-Duty Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is my third HP Chromebook, and all have served me well. I use it as an ultra-portable web browser with a keyboard -- a much bigger screen than my phone, with a tactile, physical keyboard that I strongly prefer over a tablet's touch interface. My only complaint with low-end Chromebooks is they tend to chug / slow down for many websites and when loading memory-intensive applications like Google Docs / Sheets. If you can live with that shortcoming, it's a great value as a second laptop or something for your kids.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this Chromebook really impresses me, especially in comparison to the last netbook I purchased. The device seems much sturdier than my non-Chromebook and has a significantly longer battery life. Also, the microphone and speaker quality is FAR superior to that of my other netbook. On the downside, I can't download or use Facebook Gameroom, nor was I able to download Firefox (which might have enabled me to play Gameroom). Overall, however, I am very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Heisler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little travel laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little tool. I'm very pleased. For a Chromebook, it's quite nice. Not a bit disappointed. I've been impressed with HP products lately.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Know all requirements before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: This replaces an old windows notebook with Vista. I am using an old Canon printer, Pixma MP 250. I’m trying to find the proper printer to purchase to mate with this Chrome book. Everything else seems to be satisfactory operation wise. I’ll give a more in depth review after I purchase a printer and mate it with the Chrome book.
customer_reviews.author: Clipper

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Good Price, Software Faulty.
customer_reviews.text: Product is of a durable material, is easy to transport and priced well. However, software and the way the given product functions can be difficult and confusing. The device lacks the features that are needed for basic digital media and relies on produced apps which are very limited in selection. To add the Bluetooth feature of this product tends to not function at times. Due to Software issue It is not recommended as a Personal Device.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler W.

customer_reviews.title: Please help!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for over a year now and it's been doing great! The only downside is that it has NO hdmi ports! I bought a HDMI USB adapter to watch my shows on my tv. But it does not work. My TV justs says that it has No Signal. If anyone has gone through this and fixed it, please help me lol. I've looked through all the websites and done everything and it still does not work. Thank you in advance if you choose to take your time out of your day to help me. I appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: KGarrels

customer_reviews.title: Not super high quality, but good for a middle schooler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7th grade sister to do homework since everything is moving to digital and the iPad just wasn't practical anymore. She loves it and can get all her homework done on it. It's no MacBook obviously so the screen quality is sub par but it still works for her purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited about getting this for my daughter for school but the mic has never worked, no one can hear anything but static from us no matter the troubleshooting we did, and it was pretty slow. I selected and paid for a new one, I keep hearing these are great for kiddos for school, but I’m starting to think we ended up with a refurbished one. Really upset about it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney MacKrell

customer_reviews.title: Great for basic needs
customer_reviews.text: I don't like not have a caps lock button, but it's great for simple internet usage. Browsing the web, editing documents and submitting my resume are pretty much all I use it for so it's perfect for me! I have used all of the features, but like I said- of you just need basic internet access, this will do the job, stays charged for quite some time & it's not bulky or heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just great!
customer_reviews.text: This Chromebook is just what I wanted. It's great for my needs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bjinpb

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 2 days!!😡😡
customer_reviews.text: The 2 days it worked it was great. On the 3rd morning it wouldn’t come out of sleep mode. I have tried everything suggested by HP and nothing has worked. Brand new and got a whole 10 hours out of it!! Already replaced with a Samsung that has been running with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great product and power machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product and power machine for the price. Going back to school in my adult life and its perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Good Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is the most barebones and standard laptop you can get. There’s nothing special about it. It’s chrome os. But it’ll last you, I’ve had mine for 3 years now and it works just as well as when I bought It
customer_reviews.author: Redthehokage

customer_reviews.title: Great product Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Update, product dead. 2 months. And customer service even worse. Don't buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life, fast
customer_reviews.text: I typically have at least 30 tabs open at once, but it still works well. You can't really notice the difference. Webcam is not that good, but it's serviceable. The battery life is excellent. It lasts usually 6 hrs with normal usage, and if I'm just reading, it goes a lot further.
customer_reviews.author: Won Hee Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life. Good for buck. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lane

customer_reviews.title: affordable and ready to go
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product. i use it for shopping ,bill pay ,and job hunting. the no frills model is perfect for my usage.. my mom even got a chrome book for herself.. although larger with a back lit key board. These are pretty awesome in affordability and account management.. no bloat ware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and perfect for child to carry to and from school. Fast delivery. The right tool for the job
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Looks brand new. Working perfectly. My kids are thankful to have it during our quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: chriso31

customer_reviews.title: Hard operating system!
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice computer, but my daughter couldn't download much. The operating system wasn't compatible with pretty much anything. I you buy, I would consider already having windows to download on this Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Myah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: That's perfect good size cuz everything that a bigger one does
customer_reviews.author: tniccum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had been wanting one. This was the best price I found. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: CBrown

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is good for my 9 year old for his school, it’s fast and the battery life lasts for days without charging. The only thing is that the screen could be a little more brighter.
customer_reviews.author: S Baker

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had item for only four months now it won't turn on or hold a charge. I have insurance but no way to contact them. I want my money back or replacement
customer_reviews.author: Ida A Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: I like that the laptop came as described and functions well
customer_reviews.author: Savannah123hl

customer_reviews.title: Screen movement
customer_reviews.text: Just starting to use it and so far so good! It seems that I cannot get the screen to move up and down easily!
customer_reviews.author: tbm1953

customer_reviews.title: Bad laptop
customer_reviews.text: Chrome book quit working just after 30 day warranty was up. Will never buy again
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Sent it to me with Chrome OS DAMAGED/DISABLED
customer_reviews.text: How would you expect me to use this computer when it won’t turn on? This computer is literally unusable unless I buy additional items to use. Despicable.
customer_reviews.author: myra brown

customer_reviews.title: Pay Attention to Negative Reviews
customer_reviews.text: Seldom used since purchase. Thought of returning because of its limitations, but didn't unfortunately. Tried to power up today and no luck, though power light is blue.. Now discovering it's 4 days beyond the return date. Should have needed the reviews. Though packaging indicated this was new and not refurbished, that's probably not true either. Look elsewhere, pay a little more or just use your Kindle to surf.
customer_reviews.author: Carol in TN

customer_reviews.title: it is good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It is very safe for me to use this. it is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Miah

customer_reviews.title: Good features and performance at a rock bottom price.
customer_reviews.text: Don't like Amazon for not making a Kindle reader program available. Otherwise, it's a lot of computer. I'm liking Chrome OS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very happy with her new laptop. Thanks for making me a hero, not a zero.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Glad the item came on time
customer_reviews.text: Glad the item came on time. It works fine. I know at 11.6 inches the screen is not the biggest but it provides what I need to have done.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bakken

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money. Just a few years ago, something like this would've cost over a grand.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for middle school kids
customer_reviews.text: Good buy for my middle schooler, but wish the parental controls were more comprehensive and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Saluki Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I expected it to do. May get another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: dale byrd

customer_reviews.title: Good little Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Good little Chromebook. Exactly as advertised. My only complaint is that it felt a lot slower than what I expected. Can barely handle a few tabs open. I'm also not a fan of the touchpad/mouse button. You also need to know what you're getting into when it comes to Chrome OS.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Chromebook !
customer_reviews.text: This Chromebook was purchased almost 5 months ago. It was purchased for my daughters 12th birthday. She absolutely loves it. She is very rough with electronics and this Chromebook is holding up very well. Its mostly used for watching YouTube and googling things. The speed is very pleasing and I've heard zero complaints. The battery life on the Chromebook is really good, it will last about 6 hours before needing to be charged . It also charges fast when plugged in. The screen looks clear and is a good size for a small Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: A. MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Really great little laptop
customer_reviews.text: Terrific buy. Perfect convenient weight and size. Battery life is amazing. Streaming couldn't be better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jaye

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The item that's pictured is definitely NOT the item I received!!! The usb and hdmi inputs are towards the front of the keyboard. The HP I received the inputs are towards the rear of the keyboard! And on the bottom it is stamped "Model HP Chromebook 11 G4 and it's not a touchscreen!....Seems to be an older model...I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SW

product_meta.title: HP Chromebook 4GB RAM, 16GB eMMC with Chrome OS, Black
product_meta.description: Lean, mean, amazing machine. This Chromebook makes working online effortless. It's easy to use, fun to show off, and perfectly portable with power to last all day. Amazing, isn't it?
feature_bullets: 4 GB LPDDR3 SDRAM Memory (onboard), Intel HD Graphics 400
11.6-inch diagonal HD SVA Antiglare WLED-backlit Display (1366x768)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars225 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
